Articles.Content: Hey, I need help using CKAN. I can't really install mods normally without CKAN, but i need it to install them for me since i do not know how to install them. My laptop is a Mac OS X EI Capitan Version 10.11.6. I have also installed mono, as well. Please Help!
If you are using the CKAN Gui, you can uninstall a mod by unchecking its box.
The CKAN menu pops up, but nothing is on the list. I cannot choose anything but "add New". Is this normal? I am kind of a computer noob, so I'm not that experienced using a computer.
The client will try to autodetect the location of your KSP folder, but if it can't then yes it's normal to get an empty installation list. Have you followed the directions in the user guide?
Yes. How do you pup op the window that is known as "KSP command-line arguments"? It shows an image of the window, but I'm confused on how to pull it up
